mdRecord.dcterms:title: Akers Family Cemetery, Indian Valley District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Accessed through a gate to the right of driveway for 1658 Sawmill Road NW. Drive up a short Lane to the cemetery. It is in an open lot, fenced and very well maintained. Cemetery is visible using Google Earth.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
